mapper.select: SELECT PLAN_ID AS planId,AREA_CODE AS areaCode, STANDARD_CODE AS standardCode,START_TIME AS startTime, END_TIME AS endTime,PLAN_TIME_TYPE AS planTimeType FROM tb_plan WHERE PLAN_TIME_TYPE = 'DAY' AND START_TIME >= #{startTime} OR START_TIME < #{endTime} UNION SELECT PLAN_ID ,AREA_CODE,STANDARD_CODE,START_TIME,END_TIME,PLAN_TIME_TYPE FROM tb_plan WHERE PLAN_TIME_TYPE = 'WEEK' AND( WEEK= #{week} AND START_TIME >= #{startTime}) OR ( WEEK= #{weekAdd} AND START_TIME < #{endTime}) UNION SELECT PLAN_ID ,AREA_CODE,STANDARD_CODE,START_TIME,END_TIME,PLAN_TIME_TYPE FROM tb_plan WHERE PLAN_TIME_TYPE = 'MONTH' AND( DAY= #{day} AND START_TIME >= #{startTime}) OR ( DAY= #{dayAdd} AND START_TIME < #{endTime}) UNION SELECT PLAN_ID ,AREA_CODE,STANDARD_CODE,START_TIME,END_TIME,PLAN_TIME_TYPE FROM tb_plan WHERE PLAN_TIME_TYPE = 'YEAR' AND(MONTH =#{monthNo} AND DAY= #{day} AND START_TIME >= #{startTime}) OR (MONTH =#{monthNoAdd} AND DAY= #{dayAdd} AND START_TIME < #{endTime})
